message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm afraid I won't go as low as $140. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I understand that you're willing to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $145?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go that low. How about we meet at $155?
I'm getting close to walking away, but I still really want this product. Would you be willing to go down to $150?
